resources.string: Select the apps need to be locked

Delete the folder and release apps into app drawer?

Solve screen mess, but it may reduce performance.
It may reduce performance, please turn it off when you meet any problems.
Keep GO Launcher persistent may cause unstable error,please turn it off when you meet any errors.
Prevent force-closes when running out of memory
Put 3rd party font files into the dir of "/GOLauncherEX/fonts" for more choices.
The new heap size will take effect after reboot.

Heap is the amount of memory each application can use. Changing the heap size to a higher value will allow bigger apps to run faster, such as GO Launcher.\nMake sure you have root your phone, if not, check the tutorial below:
Fail to set the heapsize, make sure GOLauncher has got the highest authority\nand the Busybox has been installed

Failed !The icon has been moved back to its original position.

Unexpected error, send an error report…
Please select this to help us fix the problem
An unexpected error caused the program to stop .We need your feedback to help us fix the problem. Please be assured that we only collect error information ,not personal information .
Out of memory, delete widgets or kill apps to continue

GO Launcher supports to copy home screen(only icons) from other launcher, start to copy home screen now?

1、Set the phone to portrait
2、Set the number of grids to 4x4

We optimized the adaptation for pad resolution, which may cause big icon issue. If you want to return to default icon size of v2.70, click the button below. You can also change gird size in \"screen settings\" and change icon size in \"visual settings- icon\".

Help us to fix theme download error
Click to send mail to us for the error
GO Launcher Theme Error Bug Report -
We have detected there is an theme download error of your phone. We need some information of your phone to fix the bug, please send the mail to us.
Internal error. Please try to lock screen again.
Internal error.Please deactivate GOLauncher in system settings.
Internal error.Lock screen failed.The issue may get fixed by reboot your phone or deactivate and activate lock screen again.
Lock screen is only supported by Android2.2 and higher.
Try rebooting mobile phone problem solving

lease assign the Auto-lock right to GO GoLauncher to activate the screen-lock functionality. To uninstall GoLauncher, please deactivate the screen-lock functionality first in Settings -> Location and security -> Select device administrators -> Deactivate GO GoLauncher

To uninstall GoLauncher after activate the screen-lock function , please deactivate the screen-lock functionality first in Settings -> Location and security -> Select device administrators -> Deactivate GO GoLauncher
The "Always finish activities" function is enabled which will prevent GO Launcher, click "confirm" to close it.
Lock screen function requires GO switch widget, \ndownload now?
Lock screen function requires update GO switch widget to the latest version.\nupdate now?
Fail to delete, please restart the launcher.
Keep GO Launcher persistent will cause unstable error, disable it when you meet errors!
